text: While civilization has been improving our houses, it has not equally improved the men who are to inhabit them. It has created palaces, but it was not so easy to create noblemen and kings.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: When women go wrong, men go right after them.
author: Mae West

text: Men have become the tools of their tools.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Men are not prisoners of fate, but only prisoners of their own minds.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: It is the most sensual men who need to flee women and torment their bodies.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche
